summary: SummaryHighlightsSustainable PackagingClinique Pop Longwear Lipstick for long-lasting, feel-good color in 3 finishes: Satin, Matte, and Shine.
details: DetailsBenefitsMerges rich, saturated color with a built-in primer for smooth application and comfortable wear.Glides on effortlessly and delivers ultra-pigmented, full-coverage color with each swipe.Suits all lips and looks, with a wide range of shades designed to match all skin tones and 3 finishes for every mood.Built to last all day with 8-hour, color-true wear.Allergy tested. 100% fragrance free.Formulated WithoutParabensPhthalatesSynthetic colorsTalcItem 2619998How To UseApply lipstick to clean, bare lips.Can be worn with Quickliner for Lips Lip Liner or layered with bestselling Clinique Pop Lip Gloss.IngredientsRicinus Communis (Castor) Seed Oil, Diisostearyl Malate, Trioctyldodecyl Citrate, Lanolin Oil, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Euphorbia Cerifera Ethylhexyl Palmitate, Triticum Vulgare (Wheat) Germ Extract, Olea Europaea (Olive) Fruit Extract, Triticum Vulgare (Wheat) Bran Extract, Microcrystalline Wax\Cera Microcristallina\Cire Microcristalline, Astrocaryum Murumuru Seed Butter, Prunus Armeniaca (Apricot) Kernel Oil, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Cholesterol, Hordeum Distichon (Barley) Extract\Extrait D'Orge À Deux Rangs, Ceramide Ng, Palmitic Acid, Squalane, Lauryl Pca, Lauryl Methacrylate/Glycol Dimethacrylate Crosspolymer, Linoleic Acid, Tocopheryl Acetate, Glyceryl Stearate, Oleic Acid, Butylene Glycol, Tetrahexyldecyl Ascorbate, Sodium Hyaluronate, Potassium Sulfate, Silica Dimethyl Silylate, Barium Sulfate, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Aluminum Hydroxide, Phenoxyethanol, 42090), Carmine (Ci 75470), Red 22 Lake (Ci 45380), Red 28 Lake (Ci 45410), Red 30 Lake (Ci 73360), Red 33 Lake (Ci 17200), Red 6 (Ci 15850), Red 7 Lake (Ci 15850), Yellow 5 Lake (Ci 19140), Yellow 6 Lake (Ci 15985).Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details

reviews.headline: I always come back to you
reviews.comments: These lipsticks have a primer in the formula, so they stay put and they stay comfortable. The color payoff, the creamy texture, the way it feels locked on my lips. I cant find a better formula!

reviews.headline: Delivered with lipstick broken
reviews.comments:
Great color
Unfortunately product is broken and smeared all in the tube

reviews.headline: Love the way it looks
reviews.comments: Though I didn't buy this product, but received it as a gift from a friend with other Clinique products in a gift bag, I love the Love Pop shine color, which is a neutral mauve shade. It really compliments my skin and looks good on my lips that last all day long. Would buy it in other shades in the future.

reviews.headline: Color: Bare Pop
reviews.comments: Love this color! It's perfect to add a little color!

reviews.headline: Love it
reviews.comments: This is the perfect summer shade

reviews.headline: Great color!
reviews.comments: Long lasting lipstick! Would purchase again.

reviews.headline: Love Pop Lipstick
reviews.comments: Been using Clinique for forty years. Love this new longwear lipstick. It stays on much longer than others. Very happy with it and glad it comes in so many colors.

reviews.headline: Maybe not
reviews.comments: Came off too easily and faded shortly after the color faded

reviews.headline: Great Lipstick
reviews.comments: Great long lasting lipstick. Have a few different colors in the Clinique Pop Longwesr

reviews.headline: I will buy it again
reviews.comments: I really love the lipstick/ I only wish it stayed on longer/ The color is great and the creamyness feel great.

reviews.headline: Love the Color
reviews.comments: Ordered the color Love Pop.  I love the color.  It's a nice shade of pink, soft and creamy, goes on well.  I lick my lips a lot so I do have to reapply.  It's a staple in my makeup bag.

reviews.headline: I love it!
reviews.comments: Smooth application, lasting color, very happy with this purchase.

reviews.headline: Creamy perfection
reviews.comments: Love the gorgeous coverage and color. Lasts well bf need for reapplying.

reviews.headline: Icon pop
reviews.comments: Icon pop is a lovely shade.   Has great staying power. Will definitely try other colors.

reviews.headline: Happy customer
reviews.comments: Love this lipstick, especially is good for people like me with chemical sensitivity thank you

reviews.headline: Staying power
reviews.comments: Love the color and the staying power of this long wearing lipstick

reviews.headline: Love this!
reviews.comments: Clinque is always a solid brand. This lipstick stays on and the color snd finish sre great!

reviews.headline: Perfect lipstick
reviews.comments: Fantastic lipstick. Beautiful coral color and hydrating. Perfect amount of shine too.

faceoff_positive.comments:
I bought a few of these lipsticks during a sale recently and these are my conclusions…

I purchased Beach Pop, Bare Pop, Blush Pop, Clove Pop. With this particular line of lipsticks, it almost seems like Clinique just piecemealed together a bunch of random colors and formulas and put matching packaging on them.

Beach Pop is a creamy opaque matte. I would describe the color as a very cool toned deep rosy brown. The lipstick broke with the first application. I think this was because it is so creamy and soft. Based on this formulation alone, I wouldn't have expected this to be coined as a long lasting lipstick..

Clove Pop is my favorite of the 4 i bought. The formula is not like Beach Pop's, even though both are in the same line and both are described as matte. Clove Pop is a lot lighter in weight and less creamy in texture, making it feel less moisturizing compared to Beach Pop, however lending to its ability to last longer throughout the day . I would describe the color as a soft neutral rosy brown.

Bare Pop and Blush Pop seem to be the same formula and very similar colors. They are both shiny and sheer. Both are what I'd describe as blushing nude tones, however Bare Pop is just slightly cooler toned than Blush Pop, which to me seemed counterintuitive since the word "blush" is usually associated with cool mauve tones and "bare" is usually associated with warm nudes.
faceoff_positive.headline: All over the place

faceoff_negative.comments: I have extremely sensitive skin. If I wear any lipstick or lip gloss that has blue dye in it my entire face starts burning 1/3 of the way through the day. I can tell just by looking at these new Clinique Pop colors that they all have blue dye in them. They are all cool tones. Why did you do away with the beautiful brown tone lipsticks?? I loved them!! my favorite is Luscious and I can't find it at all on your website now, or anywhere else, for that matter. I wanted to stock up but can't even do that. Why do you people always have to fix what isn't broken. Why can't you just ADD to the collection instead of CHANGE the collection??? I am soooooo disappointed in Clinique. Unfortunately I'm stuck with the brand as that is how sensitive my skin is. I searched by trial and error for years to find a brand my skin would tolorate, both skin care and cosmetics. Now you're ruining it for me. Thanks a lot.
faceoff_negative.headline: Your changes are terrible
